snippet.title: The Simpsons Hit & Run Trailer (2003)
snippet.description: Vivendi Universal Games sent a VHS tape with this trailer to the press in 2003 to promote the surprisingly good The Simpsons Hit & Run for PS2, Xbox, and GameCube.
